javadoc: Manages Ghidra integration with the system clipboard when doing cut/copy/paste operations on domainFiles and domainFolders in a data tree widget.

methods.name: setClipboardContents
methods.comment: Pushes the GTreeNodes in the specified TreePath array to the clipboard.

params.name: paths
params.comment: array of TreePaths containing nodes to be pushed to clipboard.

methods.javadoc:
Clears the {@link Cuttable#isCut() isCut} flag on any GTreeNodes that are pointed to by
 the system clipboard.
methods.name: clearCuttables
methods.comment:
Clears the Cuttable#isCut() flag on any GTreeNodes that are pointed to by
 the system clipboard.

methods.name: clearCuttables
methods.comment:
Clears the Cuttable#isCut() flag on any GTreeNodes that are pointed to by
 the specified Transferable

methods.name: isCuttablePresent
methods.comment:
Returns true if the system clipboard has any GTreeNodes that have the Cuttable#isCut()
 flag set.

return.comment: boolean true if there are any cut nodes in the clipboard

methods.name: getDataTreeNodesFromClipboard
methods.comment: Fetches any GTreeNodes from the system clipboard.

return.comment:
List of GTreeNodes that were in the system clipboard, or empty list if
 no nodes or some other access error.

name: DataTreeClipboardUtils
comment:
Manages Ghidra integration with the system clipboard when doing cut/copy/paste
 operations on domainFiles and domainFolders in a data tree widget.

fields.javadoc:
Static instance of a callback handler that is notified when the clipboard is changed
 and our data is discarded.
fields.name: DATATREE_CLIPBOARD_OWNER
fields.comment:
Static instance of a callback handler that is notified when the clipboard is changed
 and our data is discarded.
